localeTranslate.name: localeTranslate
localeTranslate.description: Translations for the text field. The object keys are the two letter language codes (ru, de, it, etc.) and the values are the button label translation for each language. Example: { "en" : "name", "ru" : "имя" }

editorType.name: editorType
editorType.description:
The editors which the plugin is available for:

  • word - text document editor,
  • cell - spreadsheet editor,
  • slide - presentation editor.

initDataType.name: initDataType
initDataType.description:
The data type selected in the editor and sent to the plugin:

  • text - the text data,
  • html - HTML formatted code,
  • ole - OLE object data,
  • desktop - the desktop editor data,
  • destop-external - the main page data of the desktop app (system messages),
  • none - no data will be send to the plugin from the editor,
  • sign - the sign for the keychain plugin.

Button.name: Button
Button.description: The skinnable plugin button used in the plugin interface (used for visual plugins with their own window only, i.e. isVisual == true and isInsideMode == false).

properties.name: text
properties.description: The label which is displayed on the button.

properties.name: primary
properties.description: Defines if the button is primary or not. The primary flag affects the button skin only.

properties.name: isViewer
properties.description: Defines if the button is shown in the viewer mode only or not.

properties.name: textLocale
properties.description: Translations for the text field. The object keys are the two letter language codes (ru, de, it, etc.) and the values are the button label translation for each language.

properties.name: Tag
properties.description: A tag assigned to the content control. The same tag can be assigned to several content controls so that you can make reference to them in your code.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: A unique content control identifier. It can be used to search for a certain content control and make reference to it in your code.

properties.name: Lock
properties.description: A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not.

properties.name: InternalId
properties.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control. It is used for all operations with content controls.

ContentControlLock.name: ContentControlLock
ContentControlLock.description:
A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not:

  • 0 - only deleting,
  • 1 - disable deleting or editing,
  • 2 - only editing,
  • 3 - full access.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: An object which contains the comment data.

properties.name: Time
properties.description: The time when the comment was posted (in milliseconds).

properties.name: Solved
properties.description: Specifies if the comment is resolved (true) or not (false).

properties.name: Replies
properties.description: An array containing the comment replies represented as the CommentData object.
